guide.title: Introduction to the REST APIs
guide.description: Common aspects of Sync Gateway's two REST APIs

introduction.paragraph: Sync Gateway has two REST APIs:

unordered-list.list-item: Public REST API: The Public REST API provides gateway functionality and synchronization between a Couchbase Lite application and a Couchbase Server database.

Admin REST API: The Admin REST API is a superset of the Public REST API. It includes all API calls available through the Public REST API, as well as additional API calls for managing users and roles, managing databases, and performing other administrative tasks.

introduction.paragraph: Both REST APIs share the characteristics that we explain here.
